events.name: The Aftermath

events.description: Emergence of individuals with natural Storm abilities
events.significance: Beginning of new traditions and understanding

events.name: The Eye of the Storm

ancient_era.title: The Age of the Ancients
ancient_era.description: The rise and fall of humanity's advanced civilization

events.name: First Contact
events.description: Humanity discovers the Void, mistaking it for the totality of the primal force, unaware it was merely the Storm's shadow
events.significance: Marked the beginning of technological advancement through Void manipulation

events.name: Technological Revolution
events.description: Rapid advancement of civilization through Void-tech integration

golden_age.title: The Golden Age of Equilibrium
golden_age.description: Brief period of perfect balance between Storm and Void energies

lower_class.significance: Became breeding ground for Storm insurgency

eternal_program.title: The Eternal Program
eternal_program.description: The Ancient leadership's attempt to create perfect Void-powered enforcers

creation_process.description: Horrific procedure of infusing humans with concentrated Void energy

stages.name: Selection
stages.description: Chosen from those showing resistance to emotional manipulation

stages.name: Void Infusion
stages.description: Subjects remain conscious as their humanity is stripped away

stages.name: Transformation
stages.description: Final stage where subject becomes an Eternal

radiant_deity.title: The Radiant Deity
radiant_deity.description: Most powerful of the Eternals, embodiment of perfect order

long_term: Led to creation of Storm Titan program

storm_titan_program.title: The Storm Titan Program
storm_titan_program.description: The Collective's attempt to create Storm-powered humans

the_collective.description: Secret scientific organization seeking to harness Storm energy

the_veil_incident.description: Confrontation with Void agent that led to the Shattering

bloodline.description: The Shatterer's descendants inherit Storm affinity

aeron.title: The Tinkerer
aeron.description: Direct descendant of the Shatterer, combines Storm power with technological innovation

impact_on_future.description: The program's effects echo through generations

the_shattering.title: The Great Shattering
the_shattering.description: The cataclysmic event that forever changed the world, born from the clash between Storm and Void

the_collective.desperation: Racing against time to perfect Storm control

events.name: The Void Gates Crisis
events.description: Network of reality-bending gates began failing, causing temporal anomalies and energy surges
events.impact: Created the first cracks in reality's fabric

actions: Forced emotional dampening of entire districts

events.name: The Storm Uprising
events.description: Mass rebellion in the lower districts as Storm-touched individuals fought against Void suppression

events.name: The Collective's Gambit
events.description: Final desperate attempts to control Storm energy
actions: Mass activation of Storm Titan candidates

the_shatterer.background: Former Subject Zero of the Storm Titan Program
the_shatterer.emotional_state: Devastating grief and rage over family's destruction
the_shatterer.power_manifestation: Unprecedented fusion of emotional trauma and Storm energy

the_veil.conflict: Growing emotional awakening versus perfect Void training
the_veil.power_manifestation: Suppressed guilt creating pure Void energy

trigger_events: Orchestrated destruction of the Shatterer's family
The Veil's moment of emotional breakthrough
Collision of primal Storm and Void energies
immediate_effects: Creation of the first Storm-Void rifts
Birth of modern Storm and Void manifestations

phases.name: The Initial Blast
phases.description: Pure emotional energy meeting perfect suppression created a reality-breaking shockwave

eternal_response.actions: Mass convergence of Eternals attempting containment
eternal_response.impact: Loss of primary Void control force

phases.name: The Chain Reaction
phases.description: Void Gate network collapse amplifying the catastrophe

phases.name: The Final Surge
phases.description: Complete breakdown of Ancient technology and control systems

collective_fate.description: Dissolution of the organization as Storm-tech facilities collapse

the_shatterer.status: Transformed into a force of nature

the_veil.manifestations: Present in moments of perfect control
